page.title: 10Old Warden Lower School
page.content: Children in the village are educated at {Old Warden Lower School.}It was built in 1875 under public subscription. Today there are 2 classes,with only 35 children in the school.The headmistress is Mrs.Fryatt,the 8th head of the school. The children start this school at the age of 4+ and they leave at 9 to go to {Robert Bloomfield Middle School}in Shefford,the nearest middle school in the area. On a typical day,they would start with an assembly at 9 o'clock and then they have their lessons including English,Maths,Cookery,Painting or doing gym to a tape.At lunchtime in summer they take their packed lunches on the school field.
